English: Like any good modder, this mighty little engine is fueled by a Hydrogen?... You nbeed it for lift, right? But you've got to put in the work to get there - and this booster does just that! As it does run on a high-test blend of OP, it's... well... kinda OP...

Like any good modder, this mighty little engine is fueled by a 1:1 ratio of Optimism and Perspiration (sweat). You've got to believe in yourself, but you've got to put in the work to get there - and this booster does just that! As it does run on a high-test blend of OP, it's... well... kinda OP...

Like any good modder, this mighty little engine is fueled by a 1:1 ratio of Oxidizer and Methane (farts). You've got to believe in yourself, but you've got to put in the work to get there - and this booster does just that! As it does run on a high-test blend of OP, it's... well... kinda OP...

Like any good modder, this mighty little tank is filled with Optimism and... Perspiration? Eeewwww! Why would you bring me a tank full of SWEAT!? Are you out of your mind? Get that filthy thing out of here!

Like any good modder, this mighty little tank is filled with Oxidizer and... Methane? Eeewwww! Why would you bring me a tank full of FARTS!? Are you out of your mind? Get that disgusting thing out of here!
